price: 43. Wana ezali bandakisa tozali kopesa yango тропа bato, тре baye bakoki koyeba yango sé baye bazali na boyebi.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-amthālu naḍribuhā lilnnāsi wamā yaʿqiluhā illā al-ʿālimūna
